thread.section_title: Barking Mad Dog Care Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.barkingmad.uk.com
thread.title: Tracy Freeman
thread.title_full: Barking Mad Dog Care reviewed by Tracy Freeman

author: Tracy Freeman
title: Tracy Freeman
text:
When Sakura went for her first weekend sleep over I was so nervous especially when I was waving her off in the back of the car with Stewart as I was thinking this is my baby and I don't know where she is going and might not never see her again and trust me that hour or so felt like weeks waiting to here from Stewart saying Sakura is all good and texting me a photo of her, what I also liked was the fact because you don't get to meet the Hoist you have a pet schedule which you input all your Pets requirements do's and don't and then that is handed to the hoist to abide by, but also gives the Hoist some intel in to your pet as to best way of looking after them.
But once that first time is over and you get updates on how Sakura is doing it makes you feel so much better, and when Stewart bought Sakura back all that anxiety left and I was so happy to see her and to see that she was ok. Sakura had her week holiday last week and bonded really well with her hoist Shelia they got on really well to well in fact as Shelia wanted to keep her lol. When Sakura returned she was happy and seemed to get right back into her routine so all in all I was happy that all went well, and will have no worries next time Sakura goes on Holiday, as its peace of mind to know Sakura has gone from her own home to another dog loving home for cuddles!!!
Thanks guys see you soon Stewart and Victoria.
